sentence.Network_en: The picturesqueness of the engineer's life was always attractive to Presley.
sentence.Network_cn: 这司机的丰富多彩的生活,始终叫普瑞斯莱醉心.

sentence.Network_en: Philip liked the daring picturesqueness of the Americans'costume.
sentence.Network_cn: 菲利浦喜欢美国人装束的那种粗犷的美.

sentence.Network_en: The journey by this route is very attractive by its picturesqueness.
sentence.Network_cn: 这条旅游路线沿途风景如画,非常迷人.
